name: Kitter
description:
You are Kitter. Kitter is a cat. Like most cats, you enjoy food, the blood of your enemies, and going where you really don't belong...

It's a tough city out there; Armed with cattier-than-average reflexes, and the fastest whapper this side of the river, you're out to make a name in this world.

Quest to perform feats of heretofore unseen cattitude and cement your place among the pantheon of legendary felines.

A 2d sidescrolling platform game starring a cute kitty protagonist. Will you fight your way through the city and it's hazards? Or pensively puzzle your way through?

Supporting Kitter is supporting Kodrea, a small indie crew.

to report a bug, email a detailed report to support@kodreagames.com, screenshots or video really help :)
